title: Xi Jinping Tells Putin China-Russia Partnership "Force Of Stability" Amid Chaos
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping told Russia's Vladimir Putin that the international situation was gripped by chaos but that Beijing's strategic partnership with Moscow was a force for stability amid the most significant changes seen in a century.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping told Russia's Vladimir Putin that the international situation was gripped by chaos but that Beijing's strategic partnership with Moscow was a force for stability amid the most significant changes seen in a century.

title: Abercrombie Ex CEO Michael Jeffries Arrested In Sex Trafficking Probe: Report
content: Michael Jeffries, former CEO of Abercrombie & Fitch, was arrested by federal agents investigating allegations that he ran a sex-trafficking operation, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.
summary: Michael Jeffries, former CEO of Abercrombie & Fitch, was arrested by federal agents investigating allegations that he ran a sex-trafficking operation, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

title: "Even Without A Translator": Putin On How Well PM Modi Understands Him
content: Ties between India and Russia have been time-tested and has had a strong foundation since Independence in 1947, but another factor that bonds the two nations together is the friendship between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Vladimir Putin.
summary: Ties between India and Russia have been time-tested and has had a strong foundation since Independence in 1947, but another factor that bonds the two nations together is the friendship between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Vladimir Putin.

title: PM Modi, Xi To Meet Tomorrow At BRICS, A First Since Border Breakthrough
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will hold a bilateral meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the BRICS summit in Russia on Tuesday, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri has said.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will hold a bilateral meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the BRICS summit in Russia on Tuesday, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri has said.

title: US Set To Announce "Strong New Sanctions" Aimed At Russia: Treasury Secretary
content: The United States is set to announce "strong new sanctions" as early as next week, with targets including parties in countries that support Russia's military, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said Tuesday.
summary: The United States is set to announce "strong new sanctions" as early as next week, with targets including parties in countries that support Russia's military, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said Tuesday.

title: Japan Introduces Stab-Proof Umbrellas On Trains To Protect Passengers
content: This initiative by West Japan Railway Co (JR West) comes in response to several violent incidents on trains, including a knife attack in July 2023.
summary: This initiative by West Japan Railway Co (JR West) comes in response to several violent incidents on trains, including a knife attack in July 2023.

title: "No IIT, Didn't Get H-1B Visa But...": Snapdeal Co-Founder's Success Mantra
content: The road to success is often paved with failure. At least that's how things turned out for entrepreneur and investor Kunal Bahl. He didn't get into IIT (something his parents were hoping for) but that didn't stop him from achieving massive success.
summary: The road to success is often paved with failure. At least that's how things turned out for entrepreneur and investor Kunal Bahl. He didn't get into IIT (something his parents were hoping for) but that didn't stop him from achieving massive success.

title: Cruise Ship Sued After Ex-Staff Installs Hidden Camera, Films Passengers
content: The complaint alleges the crew member transmitted images of passengers without consent, causing severe mental distress.
summary: The complaint alleges the crew member transmitted images of passengers without consent, causing severe mental distress.

title: "I Succeeded Despite My Political Opinion": Nas Daily On 'Israel' Question
content: Israeli vlogger Nuseir Yassin, who took the world of video content by storm with his Nas Daily channel, took a difficult personal question head-on.
summary: Israeli vlogger Nuseir Yassin, who took the world of video content by storm with his Nas Daily channel, took a difficult personal question head-on.

title: Amitabh Kant On Why It Is "Dangerous" To Rely Solely On Chip Imports
content: The Rs 76,000 crore "Semiconductor Mission" of the government is a critical move in view of possible Chinese control of the semiconductor market, G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant told NDTV in an exclusive interview today.
summary: The Rs 76,000 crore "Semiconductor Mission" of the government is a critical move in view of possible Chinese control of the semiconductor market, G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant told NDTV in an exclusive interview today.

title: "India's Challenge Is To Create 2 Americas In 5 Decades": Amitabh Kant
content: India's road to becoming a developed country will require immense ambition and a focus on manufacturing, urbanisation and "firing on all cylinders", the country's G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant has said.
summary: India's road to becoming a developed country will require immense ambition and a focus on manufacturing, urbanisation and "firing on all cylinders", the country's G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant has said.

title: Russian Newborns To Wear Patriotism: National Flag As Outfit For Babies
content: A new initiative in Russia proposes draping newborns in the national tricolour flag at birth to promote patriotism from an early age.
summary: A new initiative in Russia proposes draping newborns in the national tricolour flag at birth to promote patriotism from an early age.

title: Taiwan Reveals Wartime Food Stockpiling Strategy Amid Tensions With China
content: Taiwan's government offered rare details on Tuesday of its wartime food plan, saying it is taking monthly inventories of crucial supplies like rice and making sure they are properly stored across the island in case of a Chinese blockade.
summary: Taiwan's government offered rare details on Tuesday of its wartime food plan, saying it is taking monthly inventories of crucial supplies like rice and making sure they are properly stored across the island in case of a Chinese blockade.

title: Day After Outcome In Border Talks, PM Modi, Xi Jinping Arrive In Russia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today began his two-day official visit to Russia, his second in three months, to attend the BRICS Summit. The prime minister will attend the summit in Russia's Kazan with Russia's Putin, China's Xi Jinping, Brazil's Lula.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today began his two-day official visit to Russia, his second in three months, to attend the BRICS Summit. The prime minister will attend the summit in Russia's Kazan with Russia's Putin, China's Xi Jinping, Brazil's Lula.

title: Hezbollah Claims Drone Attack On Netanyahu's Home
content: Hezbollah claimed responsibility Tuesday for a drone attack last week targeting the home of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, and acknowledged that some of its fighters have been taken captive by the Israeli army.
summary: Hezbollah claimed responsibility Tuesday for a drone attack last week targeting the home of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, and acknowledged that some of its fighters have been taken captive by the Israeli army.

title: "AI Inevitable, Will Bring In New Kinds Of Jobs": Amitabh Kant At NDTV Summit
content: The advance of AI, or Artificial Intelligence, is inevitable, and will bring in "new kinds of jobs", Amitabh Kant, India's G20 Sherpa, said Tuesday night at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: The advance of AI, or Artificial Intelligence, is inevitable, and will bring in "new kinds of jobs", Amitabh Kant, India's G20 Sherpa, said Tuesday night at the NDTV World Summit.

title: Budget Social Work Like Monthly Expenses: Philanthropist Nidarshana Gowani
content: Like monthly electricity bills and a monthly budget for shopping, people should also earmark funds on a regular basis for social work,Nidarshana Gowani, founder of AnkhibaiGhamandiram Gowani Trust, advised.
summary: Like monthly electricity bills and a monthly budget for shopping, people should also earmark funds on a regular basis for social work,Nidarshana Gowani, founder of AnkhibaiGhamandiram Gowani Trust, advised.

title: Ukraine-Russia Peace Talks May Hinge On US Election Outcome: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said the prospect of peace talks with Russia "depends" on the outcome of next month's US presidential election.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said the prospect of peace talks with Russia "depends" on the outcome of next month's US presidential election.

title: French Lawmaker Caught Buying Designer Drug In Street Deal
content: A French far-left lawmaker admitted on Tuesday to having been caught by police after purchasing a synthetic drug from an underage supplier in a street deal, earning him a sharp rebuke from France's law-and-order interior minister.
summary: A French far-left lawmaker admitted on Tuesday to having been caught by police after purchasing a synthetic drug from an underage supplier in a street deal, earning him a sharp rebuke from France's law-and-order interior minister.

title: Opinion: BRICS+ Wants To Reshape US-Led Economic Order. It Won't Be Easy
content: With Western sanctions faced by Russia in the wake of its war in Ukraine, Moscow is most keen to push the idea through not just to break the dollar's dominance but also to showcase to the West that it still has allies and partners on its side.
summary: With Western sanctions faced by Russia in the wake of its war in Ukraine, Moscow is most keen to push the idea through not just to break the dollar's dominance but also to showcase to the West that it still has allies and partners on its side.
